mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reservation (reservationNo, memberNo, accommodationNo, checkIn, checkOut, totalPrice, reservationStatus, createdAt) VALUES (#{reservationNo} ,#{memberNo}, #{accommodationNo}, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{totalPrice}, #{reservationStatus}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.reservationNo, r.accommodationNo, r.checkIn, r.checkOut, r.totalPrice, a.title, a.address, r.memberNo FROM Reservation r JOIN Accommodation a ON r.accommodationNo = a.accommodationNo WHERE r.memberNo = #{memberNo}
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE check_in BETWEEN #{checkIn} AND #{checkOut}
